eecs.instructor.gossett
Class RouletteHW

  |

        +--eecs.RobotGuiBase

              +--eecs.instructor.gossett.RouletteHW
All Implemented Interfaces:
Realism, ReflectiveColors, RouletteData, SensorState
public class RouletteHW
extends RobotGuiBase
implements RouletteData

A roulette simulation. This class uses the simulation interface to create a roulette table. The functionality provided is only for visuals and generating a random result from spinning the wheel; no scoring capability is included.

getSpaceColor

public static int getSpaceColor()
Determines the color of the space that the ball stopped in. Values returned will be one of RED_SPACE, BLACK_SPACE, or GREEN_SPACE.

Returns:
The space color, from RouletteData constants.
